requires.name: Advanced Drawing Tools
requires.description: Improved drawing tools with additional line, fill, and text styles.

requires.name: Always HP
requires.description: We're always updating HP, add a window to make it easier to adjust that

requires.name: Chat Images
requires.description: Extends chat functionality with image support.

requires.name: Hey, listen! - Chat Notifications
requires.description:
This module shows notifications of the newest chat messages, when you're currently not viewing the chat tab.
Position, opacity, fade delay, ... is all customizable!

requires.name: Condition Lab & Triggler
requires.description: Adds various combat-focused features

requires.name: Universal Battlemap Importer
requires.description: Imports scene elements from Universal VTT files generated by editors like DungeonFog and Dungeondraft

requires.name: Dice Tray
requires.description: Adds a dice tray below chat, and turns the d20 near chat into a dice calculator.

requires.name: Dice So Nice!
requires.description: Adds customizable 3D dice to Foundry VTT with lots of options to fit your playstyle.

requires.name: Handyfon's Dice Addiction
requires.description: MORE DICE, MORE OPTIONS TO SHRATCH THE ITCH!

requires.name: Drag Ruler
requires.description: When dragging a token displays a ruler showing how far you've moved that token.

requires.name: Drag Ruler Integration for Shadowdark
requires.description: Adds support for Shadowdark's "move" values to Drag-Ruler.

requires.name: Entice with Dice so Nice
requires.description: Adds a bunch of dice textures to DsN.

requires.name: Foundry Community Tables
requires.description:
This is a collection of Tables added by the FoundryVTT Community!

You can add your own tables by making a pull request here: https://github.com/foundry-vtt-community/tables

requires.name: Health Estimate
requires.description: Gives players ability to see approximate health status of a token

requires.name: Hidden Tables
requires.description: Adds an option to hide table results

requires.name: Hide GM Rolls
requires.description:
Some GMs prefer to limit the information that players receive, to maintain the mystery. For example you may wish to hide the bonuses that your legendary creature gets on its rolls, or to roll truly in the blind when an event occurs, without alerting your players to it.

This module allows sanitizing public GM rolls by hiding formulas and breakdowns from players, showing just the total instead. It can also hide private GM rolls from players entirely.

requires.name: Hide Player UI
requires.description: Allows configuration of what Foundry UI should be displayed. This is can set on a per user basis or the GM can override what UI connecting players get to see.

requires.name: Image Hover
requires.description: This module allows users to see the character art while hovering over a token.

requires.name: Item Piles
requires.description: This module adds the ability for items to be dropped onto the ground, and then picked up.

requires.name: libWrapper
requires.description: Library for wrapping core Foundry VTT methods, meant to improve compatibility between packages that wrap the same methods.

requires.name: Shadowdark Lights Out Theme
requires.description: A darker and polished UI theme for Shadowdark with party and character panels.

requires.name: Module List Export
requires.description: A simple module created to export the list of installed modules for record-keeping.

requires.name: Ownership Viewer
requires.description: Quickly see which entities (Journal entries, Actors, etc..) are visible to all players or visible to a specific player.

requires.name: PopOut!
requires.description:
This module adds a PopOut! button to most actor sheets, journal entries, and applications.

The PopOut! button allows you to open a sheet/application/document into its own window, for easier viewing or for use with multiple monitors.

requires.name: Scenery - Background Image Variation Manager
requires.description: Allows easy import and background image changes for variations such as GM/Player, Night, Seasonal, etc.

requires.name: Shadowdark Community Content
requires.description: A collection of community provided content for Shadowdark RPG

requires.name: socketlib
requires.description: A library for easier handling of foundry sockets

requires.name: Talis Dice
requires.description: Talis dice set for Dice So Nice

requires.name: Show Art
requires.description: This module adds a button to the token or tile HUD that opens the target actor's artwork, or their token artwork on right-click. It also adds shortcut keybindings: Shift+Z shows a tile/token to everyone, Shift+X shows an actor's art to everyone, hold Alt with either to show to only yourself.

requires.name: Tokenizer
requires.description: Tiny yet capable in-game token editor

requires.name: The Forge
requires.description:
This module allows players to browse their Forge Assets Library from their local games.

This module is automatically enabled for users on The Forge and is therefore not required when running your games on The Forge website.

requires.name: The Forge: More Awesomeness
requires.description: This is an optional module provided by The Forge to fix various issues and bring its own improvements to Foundry VTT. You can read more about it here.
